Author: Whoimi
Title: [ANN] QUIFAS - A Secure, Ultra-fast, Innovative Cryptocurrency Exchange
Body: The goal of Quifas is to allow anyone from anywhere in the world to safely execute crypto transactions in just a few clicks. Quifas eliminates the shortcomings of existing platforms and brings its innovative  solutions for the market, which will take its place among market leaders and become better competitors.  Quifas is an innovative exchange of crypto-currencies, which offers excellent customer service, multilingual support, excellent security, high liquidity, quick account checking and updating without any withdrawal restrictions.

Author: nhatnhatkhongnhi
Title: [ANN] QUIFAS - A Secure, Ultra-fast, Innovative Cryptocurrency Exchange
Body: The Quifas token pre- sale starts tomorrow, March 9, 2018 and ends on March 23, 2018. The basic price of 1 QFS token has been set at $0.40. The QFS token is based on the Ethereum blockchain and is therefore an ERC-20 token. Quifas aims to provide its participants with a highly secure, high-speed crypto exchange, where anyone from anywhere around the world can trade their crypto assets in a matter of few clicks.  Quifas aims to solve the issues that the current cryptocurrency exchanges face, such as high transaction loads, security breaches, scalability issues, in-efficient customer service, language issues and many more.  QFS token holders will get the additional benefit of zero trading fees on the Quifas exchange and will have the opportunity to express their opinion on coins that will get listed on the platform.

Author: sudhakark
Title: [ANN] QUIFAS - A Secure, Ultra-fast, Innovative Cryptocurrency Exchange
Body: Even today users are suffering due to lack of customer support all these issues are involved in deposits, withdrawals, or user interface which takes in solving the problem for more than a week. However, instance solutions can be given in a foreign language for those questions raised by the users. Quifas came up with a solution for all the problems raised in the exchange of the cryptocurrency. Quifas help in solving the current issues caused by the market.  Users easily can access inbuilt interface on the platform and help in highly scalable, ultra-fast and by providing extraordinary customer services. Quifas will solve any kind of problems within 24 hours and it is one of the advanced technologies for every second it will carry more than 2.5 million of transactions. If users want to upgrade their account they need to wait for week or days until the verification process is finished. Thus, Quifas aim is to complete the account verification process within 24 hours or less. Quifas supports Android or IOS platform so that users can trade directly through their phones. Quifas will integrate news section where users can get the latest news about their favorite tokens.  Even you can see the chat section where users can share their ideas and strategies.

Author: UserMT1
Title: [ANN] QUIFAS - A Secure, Ultra-fast, Innovative Cryptocurrency Exchange
Body: How will you make your exchange hack free?

Author: Quifas_Support
Title: [ANN] QUIFAS - A Secure, Ultra-fast, Innovative Cryptocurrency Exchange
Body: We are leveraging on the AWS Cloud HSM infrastructure to secure funds of investors on our platform. The HSM provides secure key storage and cryptographic operations within a tamper-resistant hardware device. The hardware is designed to detect tampering if its physical barrier is breached and HSM instance protects against brute-force login attacks. On our platform, the cloudHSM will provide database encryption, digital rights management, public key infrastructure (PKI), authentication and authorization, document signing, and secure transaction processing.

Author: needmoney
Title: [ANN] QUIFAS - A Secure, Ultra-fast, Innovative Cryptocurrency Exchange
Body: A Secure, Ultra-fast, Highly Scalable Innovative cryptocurrency exchange built for the people.   Quifas Pre-ICO will begin in 9th of March.   Website | Whitepaper | Twitter | Facebook | Telegram | Bounty | Medium   REGISTER FOR WHITELIST!     What is Quifas?  Quifas is a secure innovative cryptocurrency exchange built for the people. It is user friendly, highly scalable, ultra-fast and exceptional customer service.     Quifas Features   Exceptional Customer Services We will aim to resolve every issue in 24 hours or less. Having a multilingual support and allows us to tackle any issues the users might have.    Scalability Infrastructures Platform is designed to be scalable so as to accommodate a huge increase in new user registrations without having to shut down registrations.    Ultra Fast Matching Engine Quifas is built on one of the most advanced technology and is capable of handling 2.5 Million transaction per second. The order matching engine can execute trades in less than one millisecond.    Immediate Account Upgrade Currently, most users have to wait days or weeks for their accounts to pass verifications and an account upgrade. Quifas Exchange will aim to complete verification of accounts within 24 hours or less.    Cross Platform Support Quifas Exchange supports a fully integrated Android or IOS platform. Users can trade directly from their phones with ease.    News Section Quifas has integrated a news section where users can get the latest hottest news about their favorite tokens. There will also be a chat section where users can share ideas and strategies.    Quifas Tokensale    Platform: Ethereum (ERC-20 Token) Start of token sale: 9 March Soft cap: 3 000 000 USD Tokens issued: 200 000 000 QFS tokens Hard cap: 35 000 000 USD Basic Price of 1 QFS token: 0.40 USD Payment method: BTC ETH Minimum contribution: 0.1 ETH    Token Holders Benefits    Zero Trading Fee Token holders will be able to use Quifas token (QFS) to buy other crypto assets s on the Quifas exchange with zero trading fees.    Trading Fee Discount Holders of QFS tokens will be entitled to discount on trading fees on the exchange.    Listing of new coins Our exchange is focused on serving the people's needs, therefore QFS Token holders will have a say on which coins get listed on the exchange.    Token Sale Bonus       Distribution of raised funds     Quifas Platform Development - 40% 40% of the funds generated during token sale will be used for the development of the quifas exchange platform. This will enable us build a scalable, highly secure, world class platform with a friendly user interface that will support multi-platforms such as Web, iOS, Android on PC, Mac, Tablets and Smartphones while offering traders unique features such as trailing stops, trailing profit targets, simultaneous entry of buy orders, stop loss and take profit, market news section.   Marketing, PR and Branding - 30% 30% of the funds generated during the token sale will be used for marketing public relations and branding of the exchange. This will help in the acquisition of new customers, customer retention.   Liquidity Fund - 20% 20% of the funds generated during the token sale will be held in reserve for contingencies and other miscellaneous or unforeseen expenses that might arise. targets, simultaneous entry of buy orders, stop loss and take profit, market news section.   Legal - 10% 10% of the funds generated during the token sale will be held for ongoing legal advice.    Roadmap      Meet our Team    Florian Boci - CEO Florian is a serial entrepreneur and has over 10 years of experience in the finance and accounting industry. He is currently the CFO of Neveah Limited, an international commodity trading company. Florian has worked with the U.S. Department of Housing and Urban Development (HUD) for more than five years and has assisted in the funding of more than 7,200 public housing projects. Florian is an active crypto enthusiast and investor. He holds a Bachelor of Science from George Mason University in Accounting and Management Information Systems.    Ibidapo Lawal - COO Ibidapo is a serial entrepreneur who has founded three companies and built two to be leaders in their respective sectors. He is an international commodities trader with over a decade of experience in deal making across the globe from North America to Asia. He is an active cryptocurrency trader and investor. He has a Master in Business Administration from Drexel University, he has also taken executive education class at the Wharton Business School.    Akinbiyi Akindoyin, PhD - CTO Akinbiyi holds a PhD in Communications and Signal Processing from Imperial College London and a Masters in Broadband Wireless and Optical Communications from University of Leeds, UK. He has over 4 years experience in designing and implementing highly scalable data communication networks and has earned top industry recognised certifications including CCIE (data centre), AWS certified solution architect, Implementing Microsoft Azure Solutions.    Warun Bubna, MBA - CMO Warun holds an MBA in Finance and MS in Business Analytics from Drexel University. He has an extensive background in operations leadership and has been recognized for excellence in process improvement and project management. He has been involved in team-building and played an integral part of the Enterprise Execution team in managing multiple corporate projects simultaneously while playing the role of lead administrator in service desk and project management software system.    Meet our Team

Author: themathiasmiller
Title: [ANN] QUIFAS - A Secure, Ultra-fast, Innovative Cryptocurrency Exchange
Body: Very interesting project, I really like all the features that you are offering here, it seems like you're platform is the perfect cryptocurrency exchange site but I just have a few questions though, I read your whitepaper and it seems so short to me, you didn't really expand and explained the details behind your features, for example you stated that there will be no trading fees in your site and no withdrawal limits, how is that possible though? Wouldn't that cause your exchange to eventually go bankrupt? And in the security improvements, you stated that the quifas exchange will be monitored by a group of cyber security experts, can you give us more details on who those experts are?. And what's the technical aspect behind the ultra fast matching engine? How is 2.5 Million transaction per second possible? What's the explanation behind that?. I'm sorry for asking so many questions, the platform that you're gonna create seems very fascinating to me that's why I want to know if what you're going to create can really perform.

Author: ShuCong
Title: [ANN] QUIFAS - A Secure, Ultra-fast, Innovative Cryptocurrency Exchange
Body: Your question wasn't understood I guess. As I understand it the amount is fixed regardless of which cap they reach.

Author: kasterin111f
Title: [ANN] QUIFAS - A Secure, Ultra-fast, Innovative Cryptocurrency Exchange
Body: Tell me the difference between your project and those, which are already in the market?

Author: Quifas_Support
Title: [ANN] QUIFAS - A Secure, Ultra-fast, Innovative Cryptocurrency Exchange
Body: These are some features that differentiate Quifas from other comptetitor exchanges: 1.  Quifas will place a lot of emphasis on customer service. It will provide multilingual support and will aim to resolve every issue in 24 hours or less.   2.  Immediate Account Upgrade – Quifas will strive to upgrade  user accounts in less than 24 hours, something that other exchanges don’t do.   3.  Advanced trading features - One of the most competitive features of the Quifas platform is the ability to place stop losses on orders and take profits at the same time. Another feature that the platform presents users with is Auto Stop Loss creation in order to extract maximum potential profits after a Take Profit Level has been reached.

Author: Quifas_Support
Title: [ANN] QUIFAS - A Secure, Ultra-fast, Innovative Cryptocurrency Exchange
Body: Thank you for your support and all your questions are legit questions.  In the white paper we mention that there will be zero trading fees if you trade using QFS our custom token. If you trade BTC with ETH for example, normal fees will apply. Also there will be normal withdrawal fees. For example;  1.         QFS/ETH trades – Zero trading Fees  2.         BTC/ETH trades – Normal fees apply   Our exchange will be monitored by in-house highly skilled cyber security experts who will monitor the all transactions 24/7 on the platform.   Our exchange will be a distributed exchange, which will split the customer activity into segments.  These segments are independent, and we will be using Amazon cloud to auto-scale the exchange indefinitely.
